module.name: ap210_connection_zone_based_model_extraction
module.name.french: Extraction de modèle s'appuyant basée sur des zones de connections pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module, electrical, connection area, simulation model, network analysis, configuration management, design management

abstract.p: the representation of simulation models based on capturing behaviour using specific areas on a feature as a port rather than the entire feature. This allows more accurate simulation models than is available using feature assignment to analytical model ports. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided.
abstract.li: simulation models based on connection areas.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of simulation models based on capturing behaviour using specific areas on a feature as a port rather than the entire feature. This allows more accurate simulation models than is available using feature assignment to analytical model ports. Configuration management information and design management information is provided.

inscope.li: simulation models based on connection areas;
items within the scope of application module Analytical model, ISO/TS 10303-1603;
items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Feature and connection zone, ISO/TS 10303-1671.

outscope.li: network analysis models based on terminals only.
